mapper.select: SELECT i.swIncomeCode, i.swIsName, i.swGroupSlip, p.clientId, p.paymentCharge, p.paymentType, i.memberId, i.swIncomeRegDate, i.swIncomeFinish, i.swIncomeFinishDate FROM k2_sw_income AS i INNER JOIN k2_sw_paymentCheck AS p on i.contractManageCode = p.contractManageCode WHERE p.paymentStateCode = 'payComplete' ORDER BY i.swIncomeCode ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(i.swIncomeCode)+1 FROM k2_sw_income as i
INSERT INTO k2_sw_income( swIncomeCode, contractManageCode, swIsCode, memberIdFinish, invoiceCode, memberId, swGroupSlip, swSlipNumber, swIsName, swIncomeInfo, swIncomeRegDate, swIncomeFinish, swIncomeFinishDate )VALUES( #{swIncomeCode}, 'estimate06', '40101', 'swid001', 'code_20210101_001', 'swid001', '1', '2', '3', '4', NOW(), '5', NOW() )
